txt.en: The enemy will often attempt to reclaim a point of strategic value on the battlefield by launching a series of counterattacks. If you are defeated during a skirmish, you will gain fewer Skirmish Marks as you proceed and eventually suffer dread.

The enemy will often attempt to reclaim a point of strategic value on the battlefield by launching a series of counterattacks. If you are defeated during a skirmish, you will gain fewer Marks as you proceed and eventually suffer dread.
